name: quickpass
title: quickpass
description: Autocomplete usernames and passwords from a KeePassX database
author: Juan Grande

preferences.name: dbFilePath
preferences.title: Database File Path
preferences.description: The full path to the KeePassX database file

preferences.name: dbTimeoutMins
preferences.title: Auto-close timeout
preferences.description: The number of minutes after which the database should automatically be closed. Zero means no auto-close.
